title: I feel like new GP has the potential to be amazing
body:
But he feels undertuned as fuck. And the ult upgrade costs way too much, too little of a benefit for such a steep price. I honestly don't know, they just increased his skill cap by a lot with the potential of his E along side the passive reset with it. They could just need timer reductions at earlier levels, idk. But he just feels kinda ass stat wise.

But, I'll give him this, he has the best auto attack animation of anyone in the game atm. AA animation canceling is so easy on him, flows so well.
